effect.red_blue: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
effect.yellow: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
effect.red_green_japan: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
effect.blue_japan: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

short_effect.red_blue: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
short_effect.yellow: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
short_effect.red_green_japan: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
short_effect.blue_japan: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
